settings.accordion-content:
• A delicious way to feel calm & uplifted
  • Soft, floral taste that melts stress away
  • Supports radiant skin & natural glow
  • Strengthens immunity & reduces inflammation

Soft, floral, and gently sweet — a taste so pure it feels alive.

Each gummy captures the delicate aroma of freshly bloomed Bulgarian Roses, transforming calm into a flavor you can feel. It’s light, refreshing, and naturally uplifting — a moment of serenity that melts on your tongue.

No artificial flavoring, no syrupy aftertaste — just the real essence of rose, perfectly balanced between beauty and bliss.

Active: Rose Nectar, Organic Bulgarian Rose Oil — rich in natural antioxidants and aromatic compounds that promote calm, radiant skin, and inner balance.

No artificial flavors or colors. Vegan & plant-based.

Other: Agar, Locust Bean Gum, Natural Orange Flavor, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Sodium Lactate, Vegetable Juice For Color, Coconut Oil, Carnauba Wax, Tapioca Syrup, Cane Sugar, Water.

Each yummy contains ~ 1g sugar.

Active: Rose Nectar, Organic Bulgarian Rose Oil — rich in natural antioxidants and aromatic compounds that promote calm, radiant skin, and inner balance.

Vegan & plant-based. No artificial flavors, colors, or added sugar — just pure Bulgarian rose in its most delicious form.
Other ingredients:

Pectin, Tapioca soluble fiber, Allulose, Water, Natural orange flavor, Citric acid, Malic acid, Sodium citrate, Stevia leaf extract, Vegetable juice for color, Coconut oil, Carnauba wax.

Enjoy a few gummies daily — anytime you need a moment of calm, clarity, or uplift.

Take them in the morning to start your day grounded, or in the afternoon to reset and restore balance.

They’re delicious on their own or as part of your daily calm ritual alongside Rose Nectar or Rose Mist.

Consistency matters — a little calm each day goes a long way.

In the 1980s, Bulgaria’s scientists began exploring what locals had known for centuries — the remarkable healing powers of the Bulgarian Rose.

Even the country’s leader had grown up watching his parents take a sugar cube with a few drops of rose oil each morning — a ritual believed to keep the mind sharp, the heart strong, and the spirit young. Curious, he asked top scientists to study it further.

Their discovery confirmed what tradition had long whispered: rose oil nourishes both body and mind. It supports brain health, heart function, and graceful aging — but it also restores something deeper — a calm state that allows the body to thrive.

They called it “the fountain of youth.”

We call it the power of calm.

That discovery inspired us decades later to reimagine the rose’s benefits for modern life — turning a centuries-old ritual into a delicious daily habit. After two years of research and development, we created Rose Yummies — the world’s first rose gummies, crafted to bring calm, beauty, and vitality together in every bite

What are Rose Yummies?

Rose Yummies are the world’s first rose-infused gummies — a delicious daily ritual that delivers instant calm and sensory delight through the power of Bulgarian Rose Nectar and Rose Oil.

What makes Rose Yummies unique?

They’re designed to do what no other gummy does — calm your body and uplift your mood instantly, while delighting your senses. Each gummy combines centuries-old rose science with modern craftsmanship to bring you calm you can feel, taste, and enjoy.

Can I take more than three?

Yes. Rose Yummies are made from food-grade botanical extracts, not concentrated essential oils, so a few more on stressful days are perfectly fine.

Do they contain sugar?

You can choose between two formulas — one with just 1g of organic cane sugar per gummy, and one sugar-free, sweetened allulose.

Are they vegan and clean-label?

Yes — 100% plant-based and gelatin-free. Made with pectin and pure botanical ingredients. No artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives.

Can I take them with Rose Nectar?

Absolutely. Rose Yummies complement Rose Nectar beautifully — the Nectar works deeply to restore calm and clarity, while the Yummies offer instant calm and sensory pleasure you can enjoy anytime.

Where are they made?

Formulated and crafted in California, using Rose Nectar and Rose Oil from organically grown roses from our rose farms in Bulgaria’s Rose Valley.

Are Rose Yummies safe for children?

Yes — Rose Yummies are made from food-grade botanical extracts (Rose Nectar and Organic Bulgarian Rose Oil) and contain no alcohol, preservatives, or synthetic ingredients. They’re as safe as any clean, plant-based gummy.

For younger children, it’s best to start with half a gummy to make sure they enjoy it and tolerate it well.

Is Rose Oil Ingestible?

Yes — our Rose Oil (Rosa Damascena Otto) is food-grade and recognized as GRAS (Generally Recognized As Safe) by the FDA, meaning it’s approved for use in foods and beverages when properly diluted.

It’s the natural base used to create authentic rose flavorings found in fine foods, desserts, and traditional wellness tonics across Europe and the Middle East.

Our oil is steam-distilled from organically grown Bulgarian roses and third-party tested for purity — ensuring it’s completely safe, clean, and deliciously calming.

Can I be allergic to rose oil?

While true allergies to Rosa Damascena are rare, everyone’s body is unique, and sensitivities to botanicals can happen.

Our rose oil is 100% pure and food-grade, with no synthetic additives — but if you have a history of floral or essential oil sensitivities, we recommend starting with a small amount first.

If you notice any reaction — such as redness, itching, or digestive discomfort — discontinue use and consult your healthcare provider.

Calm should always feel good — and your comfort comes first.

settings.featured_review_text: "I felt calmer & more balanced within minutes. And the taste is absolutely divine."

settings.text:
These are delicious! I’m so glad I discovered them. They really do have a calming effect! I have one in the morning and another before bed. It’s hard not to eat half the container in one sitting though.

- Sarah B.

settings.product_testimonials_text: If you want your children to enjoy the healthiest treat around, look no further! With every bite, you can feel you are doing something great for yourself. What an amazing product for my whole family!
